Remax Hunter presents you this fantastic home built on two floors, with many possibilities for renovation, and which can be converted into two independent homes if desired.We have a reform proposal, with limited and distribution plans. This property, built on a 532 m2 plot, is distributed as follows: Ground floor: accessed through a large living room and then we find a spacious double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a large built-in wardrobe.There is another bedroom on this floor, as well as a spacious kitchen with an office and pantry, a toilet, the boiler room and the treatment plant room.From the kitchen you can access the upper floor via a beautiful solid oak staircase, which goes directly to the living room. As for facilities, the chalet has oil heating for winter and electric water heater for summer.The windows are made of aluminum and double glazing with thermal break.There is air conditioning in several rooms (living room, bedrooms).The floor is stoneware, the wall finish is gotelé and the doors are lacquered.It is a very bright home, on the ground floor it faces east-west, and on the upper floor it faces north and south. Serranillos del Valle is a beautiful municipality in the south of the Community of Madrid, very quiet and pleasant, in which single-family houses predominate.A short distance from the house there is a doctor's office, pharmacy, school, gym and green areas. Public transport allows travel to the neighboring municipalities (Griñón, Torrejón de la Calzada, Parla, Getafe, etc.) and to Madrid (Plaza Elíptica interchange).There is easy road access to the M-407 highway, which connects with the M-50, and the M-404 highway, which connects with the Toledo highway (A-42) and the A-5, as well as connections with all the municipalities of the area.
